Description: Tamarisk mummy-label of Sisois, (son of) Morsis; Greek text verso, Demotic verso.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 219 [188]. Akhmim, Bompae type (Arlt 2011)
Published in S. P. Vleeming, Demotic and Greek-Demotic Mummy Labels and Other Short texts gathered from Many Publications (Studia Demotica 9; Leuven: Peeters), no. 589.
Bibliographic references: Parlasca & Seeman 1999 / Augenblicke. Mumienporträts und ägyptische Grabkunst aus römischer Zeit (no.109)
Arlt 2011 / Deine Seele möge leben für immer und ewig: Die demotischen Mumienschilder im British Museum (no.91)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
